title: Friday Post Show (05-14-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (05-14-21)
description:
Bobby on Adam Sandler returning to the IHOP he got turned away from and a new way being developed where we can text with our brain. There’s also a new Pickle hard seltzer. Bobby and Eddie talk about how they went golfing yesterday and getting a phone call from an Arkansas State Senator’s office.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
